abilities.description: You can see brief moments into the future allowing you to attempt avoiding mistakes. When you score a miss on @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger}, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.723192c97fec4fe2]{Clash} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.d9208f9b7d827aec]{React Under Fire}, you may choose for this to have been a vision of an avoidable future. If you do, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.93d2d69b7e2b85e1]{Lose Momentum} (-2), envision how you approach the situation differently and reroll any dice. On a strong hit, take +1 momentum.

As above, but it can be used when you score a miss on @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.2f2ba4090b22a122]{Enter the Fray}, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.3f5a834fa3fea5d1]{Gain Ground}.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.a2d7793b23c17489]{Secure an Advantage} with your precognitive ability, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.93d2d69b7e2b85e1]{Lose Momentum} (-2) and make the hit options add +2 and take +1 momentum instead of the normal options.
